articles.author: CNN
articles.title: ‘This is just the beginning’: Extreme heat around the world as fires rage in southern Europe - CNN
Italy told to brace for "most intense heat wave" ever, as Europe expected to see record temperatures - CBS News
articles.description: Greece evacuates beach resorts as a wildfire erupts, Cyprus reports a fatality, and Italians are warned it could hit a record 110 degrees this week.
articles.content: Rome — Temperatures reached new highs on Monday as heat waves scorched parts of the Northern Hemisphere, triggering health warnings and fanning wildfires in the latest stark reminder of the effects o… [+3061 chars]
